description: Gets a list of built-in intents that meet the specified criteria. This operation requires permission for the lex:GetBuiltinIntents action.

nested_items.name: intents
nested_items.description: An array of builtinIntentMetadata objects, one for each intent in the response.

nested_items.name: signature
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the built-in intent. To find the signature for an intent, see Standard Built-in Intents in the Alexa Skills Kit.

nested_items.name: supportedLocales
nested_items.description: A list of identifiers for the locales that the intent supports.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token that fetches the next page of intents. If the response to this API call is truncated, Amazon Lex returns a pagination token in the response. To fetch the next page of intents, specify the pagination token in the next request.
